definitions: Sending out light; shining or glowing brightly.
(of a person or their expression) clearly emanating great joy, love, or health.
(of an emotion or quality) emanating powerfully from someone or something; very conspicuous.
(of electromagnetic energy, especially heat) transmitted by radiation, rather than conduction or convection.
(of an appliance) designed to emit radiant energy, especially for cooking or heating.
